description: This is a shell script used to test the availability of a TCP host and port, with functions for waiting, argument processing, and timeout handling.

methods.name: echoerr
methods.description: Outputs error messages to stderr unless in quiet mode.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage information for the script.

methods.name: wait_for
methods.description: Waits for a specified host and port to become available, with optional timeout.

methods.name: wait_for_wrapper
methods.description: Wraps wait_for with support for SIGINT during timeout.
